functions.name: bye
functions.description: Exits the BASIC programming environment.  Removed while translating because it can't be translated to QBASIC code.

functions.name: joyst
functions.description: Gets joystick position and stores the result in the specified columnResult and rowResult variables.

functions.name: list
functions.description: Prints/lists all code for the program

functions.name: new
functions.description: Erases the current program.  This is removed while translating to QBASIC because it can't be translated and will only create problems in QBASIC.

functions.name: trace
functions.description: Starts printing every line that executes

functions.name: untrace
functions.description: Stops printing every line that executes
